mapper.select: SELECT nm.nav_url AS navUrl, an.auth_nm AS authNm FROM nav_menu nm LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_name an ON an.auth_nm_seq = nm.nav_auth_nm_seq
SELECT sm.side_url AS sideUrl, an.auth_nm AS authNm FROM side_menu sm LEFT OUTER JOIN auth_name an ON an.auth_nm_seq = sm.side_auth_nm_seq
SELECT code, code_nm AS codeNm FROM cmm_code WHERE code_prt = #{codePrt}
SELECT ${seqNm} AS seq ,${colNm} AS col FROM ${tbNm} ORDER BY ${colNm} ASC
